00010 #if !defined(Apoxi_SharedPtr_hpp)
00011 #define Apoxi_SharedPtr_hpp
00014 
00015 #include <Auxiliary/Linkable.hpp>
00016 
00060 template< typename T_obj >
00061 class SharedPtr : public Linkable< SharedPtr<T_obj> >
00062 {
00063 public:
00067     SharedPtr();
00068 
00072     explicit SharedPtr(T_obj* pobj);
00073 
00077     SharedPtr(const SharedPtr<T_obj>& src);
00078 
00083     //template <typename T_CastFrom>
00084     //inline SharedPtr(const SharedPtr<T_CastFrom>& src);
00085 
00087     SharedPtr& operator=(const SharedPtr<T_obj>& src);
00088 
00090     //template <class T_CastFrom>
00091     //SharedPtr<T_obj>& operator=(const SharedPtr<T_CastFrom>& src);
00092 
00093     virtual ~SharedPtr();
00094 
00096     bool operator==(const SharedPtr<T_obj>& src) const;
00097 
00099     bool operator!=(const SharedPtr<T_obj>& src) const;
00100 
00104     virtual void Clear();
00105 
00106 
00109     inline T_obj& operator*();
00110 
00113     inline const T_obj& operator*() const;
00114 
00120     inline T_obj* operator->() const;
00121 
00130     inline operator bool() const;
00131 
00132 
00133 
00134 protected:
00135 
00136     inline void Ref();
00137     inline void Unref();
00138 
00139     mutable T_obj* m_pobj; //The underlying instance. Derived from ReferableObject.
00140 };
00141 
00142 template< typename T_obj >
00143 SharedPtr<T_obj>::SharedPtr()
00144 : m_pobj(0)
00145 {
00146 }
00147 
00148 template< typename T_obj >
00149 SharedPtr<T_obj>::SharedPtr(T_obj* pobj)
00150 : m_pobj(0)
00151 {
00152     if(pobj)
00153     {
00154         //Copy it:
00155         m_pobj = pobj;
00156 
00157         //Start reference counting:
00158         Ref();
00159     }
00160 }
00161 
00162 template< typename T_obj >
00163 SharedPtr<T_obj>::SharedPtr(const SharedPtr<T_obj>& src)
00164 {
00165         m_pobj = src.m_pobj;
00166 
00167         Ref();
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 template< typename T_obj >
00172 SharedPtr<T_obj>& SharedPtr<T_obj>::operator=(const SharedPtr<T_obj>& src)
00173 {
00174     if(&src != this)
00175     {
00176         //Unref any existing stuff.
00177         //operator= can never run before a constructor, so these values will be initialized already.
00178         if(m_pobj) //The if() might not be required.
00179         {
00180             Unref(); //Could cause a deallocation.
00181         }
00182 
00183         //Copy:
00184         m_pobj = src.m_pobj;
00185 
00186         Ref();
00187     }
00188 
00189     return *this;
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 template< typename T_obj >
00194 SharedPtr<T_obj>::~SharedPtr()
00195 {
00196      Unref();
00197 }
00198 
00199 template< typename T_obj >
00200 bool SharedPtr<T_obj>::operator==(const SharedPtr<T_obj>& src) const
00201 {
00202     return m_pobj == src.m_pobj;
00203 }
00204 
00205 template< typename T_obj >
00206 bool SharedPtr<T_obj>::operator!=(const SharedPtr<T_obj>& src) const
00207 {
00208     return !operator==(src);
00209 }
00210 
00211 template< typename T_obj >
00212 void SharedPtr<T_obj>::Clear()
00213 {
00214     //Forget any previous instance:
00215     //This will not affect any other SharedPtr that happens to contain the same underlying instance,
00216     if(m_pobj)
00217     {
00218         Unref();
00219         m_pobj = 0;
00220     }
00221 }
00222 
00223 template< typename T_obj >
00224 inline
00225 T_obj& SharedPtr<T_obj>::operator*()
00226 {
00227     return *m_pobj;
00228 }
00229 
00230 template< typename T_obj >
00231 inline
00232 const T_obj& SharedPtr<T_obj>::operator*() const
00233 {
00234     ASSERT(m_pobj != 0);
00235     return *m_pobj;
00236 }
00237 
00238 template< typename T_obj >
00239 inline
00240 T_obj* SharedPtr<T_obj>::operator->() const
00241 {
00242     return m_pobj;
00243 }
00244 
00245 template <class T_obj >
00246 inline
00247 SharedPtr<T_obj>::operator bool() const
00248 {
00249     return (m_pobj != 0);
00250 }
00251 
00252 
00253 template <class T_obj >
00254 inline
00255 void SharedPtr<T_obj>::Ref()
00256 {
00257     if(m_pobj)
00258         m_pobj->AddRef(); //This is really a "Reference".
00259 }
00260 
00261 template <class T_obj >
00262 inline
00263 void SharedPtr<T_obj>::Unref()
00264 {
00265     if(m_pobj)
00266         m_pobj->Release(); //This is really an "Un-reference".
00267 }
